Teriyaki Burger
■This shows a
correctly made
teriyaki
burger.

Procedure
■Put toasted quarter-pounder
buns in a bag-like wrapper.

Procedure
■Hit the crown
with a shot of
sweet lemon
sauce.

Procedure
■Put a slice
of lettuce on
top.

Procedure
■Now put the
marinated
teriyaki 
patty on it.

Procedure
■Put the heel
on top of the
completed
burger.

Procedure
■Wrap the final product up
and slide it down the HLZ.
